successes.title: GUSTIN: Redefining premium menswear, starting with denim.
successes.description: Premium menswear handcrafted in San Francisco, crowd-sourced and delivered to you at wholesale.

Pledges.description: THE SUPPORTER. A handwritten thank you note from the founders, and a GUSTIN leather patch, handcrafted in San Francisco.

THE EARLY BIRD. One limited edition pair of selvage GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. The first 100 pair we produce will be hand numbered, signed by both of the founders and will ship first.
THE REGULAR. One pair of selvage GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco.

THE HEAVY. Japanese Raw Dark Indigo denim, 13.75 oz weight. Its dense, heavy and crispy when raw. A beige tinted weft gives it a slightly dusty-metallic look. It holds its color well and develops a unique leathery hand when broken in. Hand-numbered and signed. Same cut, same sizes, same uncompromising quality.
THE STANDARD. One pair of GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Made of Cone Mills White Oak 12.5oz 100% organic selvage denim.
THE JAPAN STANDARD. One pair of GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Made of Japanese 12.5oz dark indigo selvage denim.
THE DARK. Description in Kickstarter
THE AMERICAN. One pair of GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Made of 14.75oz dark indigo selvage denim from Cone Mills White Oak in North Carolina.
THE HEAVY JAPAN. One pair of GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Made of 15.0oz dark indigo selvage denim from one of the finest mills in Japan.
THE CLASSIC. One pair of GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Made of Japanese 13.5oz dark indigo selvage denim.

THE NATURAL INDIGO. Sanforized Japanese selvage denim, natural indigo plant dye, 13 oz weight. This unique denim comes from one of the most highly regarded mills in Japan and is no longer being run in production. Natural indigo plant dye is rarely used today and is quite pricey. The shade of this fabric is a lighter blue. We’ve used this denim before and it’s pretty sweet. Hand-numbered and signed. Same cut, same sizes, same uncompromising quality. Here's a pic http://bit.ly/naturalindigo

THE GREY. Sanforized Japanese selvage denim, 11.2oz weight. Black warp and white weft creates a grey finish. Limited run from a top Japanese mill. Hand-numbered and signed. Same cut, same sizes, same uncompromising quality. bit.ly/THEGREY
THE ORGANIC. Description in Kickstarter.
THE SLUB. Description in Kickstarter.
THE CHARCOAL. Description in Kickstarter.
THE BLACK. Description in Kickstarter.
THE WHITE LINE. Description in Kickstarter.
SUPER HEAVY. 18oz beastly Japanese selvage. Description in Kickstarter.
THE ITALIAN. Description in Kickstarter
THE OVERDYE. Description on our denims page.
THE BLACK2. Description on our denims page.
THE DOUBLE. Two limited edition pair of selvage GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Any two sizes. One for you, and one for a friend. And by that we mean two for you.
THE DOUBLE STANDARD. Two of THE STANDARD.
THE JAPAN DOUBLE. Two of THE JAPAN STANDARD.
THE DOUBLE AMERICAN. Two of THE AMERICAN.
THE INTERNATIONAL. One pair of the AMERICAN, one pair of the HEAVY JAPAN. Two great heavyweights from two denim loving nations.
THE MIX. One pair of the HEAVY JAPAN, one pair of the BLACK2.
THE LOCAL. One pair of GUSTIN jeans hand-delivered over drinks with the founders in San Francisco at our favorite haunt. The first two Old Fashioneds are on us.
THE SET: BLACK2 + HEAVY JAPAN + CLASSIC
THE QUAD. Four pair of selvage GUSTIN jeans, handcrafted in San Francisco. Any four sizes. Why do you want four pair of jeans - actually we don't need to know.
